get.description: This endpoint is used to check the availability of the service. It returns a random quote from Hannibal, The Carthaginian General, along with the current time.

200.description: Successful response containing the ping status

schema.description: Resource representing the ping

quote.description: A random quote from Hannibal, The Carthaginian General.
quote.example: I will either find a way, or make one.

post.description: Collect multiple log entries, for multiple logs.

namespace.description: The namespace associated with the log.

level.description: The severity level of the log.

template.description: The template used for formatting the log message.

source.description: The source of the entry, indicating what part of the system the entry is from.

context.description: The context of the entry, providing additional information to help understand the entry.

attributes.description: The attributes of the entry, providing additional information not included in the main message.

occurred_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the entry occurred.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: The number of items per page for pagination. Defaults to 20, with a maximum of 2000.

schema.description: The levels of the log entries.
The string that the log template must contain.
The date and time after which the log occurred.
The date and time before which the log occurred.
The order of the logs.
The field to sort the logs by.
Paginated collection of LogResource.

template.description: The template for formatting the message.

first_entry_occurred_at.description: Timestamp of the first entry occurrence, if available.

last_entry_occurred_at.description: Timestamp of the last entry occurrence, if available.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the log was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the log was last updated.

namespace.description: The namespace associated with the log.

level.description: The severity level of the log.

template.description: The template used for formatting the log message.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the log was last updated.

400.description: The log data transfer object is invalid

schema.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) representing an identity in the system.

get.description: Get a log by its identity.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of log namespaces.

schema.description: Collection of LogNamespaceResource.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of log entries.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: The number of items per page for pagination. Defaults to 20, with a maximum of 2000.

schema.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) representing a log in the system.
The date and time before which the log entry was created.
The date and time after which the log entry was created.
The order of the log entries.
The source of the log entry.
Paginated collection of LogEntryResource.

identity.description: Unique identity of the log entry.

source.description: Source of the log entry.

context.description: Contextual information for the log entry.

attributes.description: Attributes associated with the log entry.

tags.description: Tags associated with the log entry.

occurred_at.description: Timestamp when the log entry occurred.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the log entry was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the log entry was last updated.

source.description: Source of the log entry.

delete.description: Delete a log entry by identity.

schema.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) representing an identity in the system.

post.description: Collect log entries from a log.

namespace.description: The namespace associated with the log.

level.description: The severity level of the log.

template.description: The template used for formatting the log message.

source.description: The source of the entry, indicating what part of the system the entry is from.

context.description: The context of the entry, providing additional information to help understand the entry.

202.description: The log collection job was accepted

400.description: The log collection job was invalid

get.description: Get the frequency count of log entries.

schema.description: The frequency for log statistics, specifying how the data should be aggregated.
Collection of LogEntryFrequencyCountResource.

items.description: Resource representing the frequency count of log entries.

date.description: Date associated with the frequency count.

count.description: Count of log entries for the specified date.

get.description: Get the frequency count of log entry sources.

schema.description: Collection of LogEntrySourceFrequencyResource.

items.description: Resource representing the frequency count of log entries by source.

source.description: Source associated with the frequency count.

count.description: Count of log entries for the specified source.

percentage.description: Percentage of log entries for the specified source.

get.description: Get the distribution of log entry tags.

schema.description: Collection of LogEntryTagDistributionResource.

items.description: Resource representing the distribution of log entries by tag.

count.description: Count of log entries for the specified tag.

get.description: Get the frequency count of logs.

schema.description: The frequency for log statistics, specifying how the data should be aggregated.
Collection of LogFrequencyCountResource.

items.description: Resource representing the frequency count of logs.

date.description: Date associated with the frequency count.

count.description: Count of logs for the specified date.

get.description: Get the statistics of log levels.

schema.description: Collection of LogLevelStatisticsResource.

items.description: Resource representing the statistics of logs by level.

count.description: Count of logs for the specified level.

percentage.description: Percentage of logs for the specified level.
